title: Kingdom Policy Decisions - Turn 1
description: Choose a policy for your kingdom. Each decision will affect your resources.

policies.title: Trade Expansion
policies.description: Focus on expanding trade routes to increase gold income, but reduce our supply reserves.
policies.flavor_text: Our merchants report increased profits from new trade agreements.

policies.title: Festival Investment
policies.description: Organize kingdom-wide festivals to boost morale, funded from the royal treasury.
policies.flavor_text: The people celebrate in the streets, their spirits lifted by grand festivities.

policies.title: Resource Stockpiling
policies.description: Prioritize gathering and storing supplies, though it may cause some public discontent.
policies.flavor_text: The royal warehouses overflow with goods, though citizens grumble about rationing.
